description: This file defines the minimal stub interface 'IFbSettings' within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace, intended for build-time satisfaction in the project. It declares various virtual methods related to device settings such as device name, SKU, country code, timezone, and notifications for changes.

classes.name: IFbSettings
classes.description: An interface for device settings management and notifications, inheriting from Core::IUnknown

methods.name: HandleAppEventNotifier
methods.description: Handles registration or unregistration for application event notifications

methods.name: SubscribeOnCountryCodeChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes from country code change notifications

methods.name: SubscribeOnTimeZoneChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes from time zone change notifications

methods.name: GetSecondScreenFriendlyName
methods.description: Retrieves the second screen friendly name

methods.name: SubscribeOnFriendlyNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes from friendly name change notifications

methods.name: SubscribeOnDeviceNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes from device name change notifications

ctags.name: IFbSettings
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IFbSettings : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
